languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each point of an Intelligence bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} (ИНТ) — это характеристика эрудиции, сообразительности и рационального мышления. За каждую единицу бонуса Интеллекта персонаж наносит +5% урона дальнобойными {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} (не применяется к выстрелам {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}).
Влияет на следующие навыки: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, Знания: Варп, Знания: Ксеносы, Логика, Медицина и Техника.

traits.locale_text:
Intelligence is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge.
It also affects Lore (Imperium), Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Intelligence, characters deal 5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each point of an Intelligence bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each point of an Intelligence bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}代表角色的敏锐程度、理性程度与知识储备。每有1点智力加值，角色在使用非{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，造成的伤害提高5%。
此外，智力还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、知识（亚空间）、知识（异形）、逻辑、医疗与科技使用这些技能。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each point of an Intelligence bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}代表角色的敏锐程度、理性程度与知识储备。每有1点智力{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}加值{/g}，角色在使用非{g|Encyclopedia:Range}连发{/g}的远程{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，造成的伤害提高5%。
此外，智力还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、知识（亚空间）、知识（异形）、逻辑、医疗与科技使用这些技能。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} (INT) mide la sagacidad, el razonamiento y el conocimiento del personaje. Por cada punto de bonificación por Inteligencia, un personaje inflige un +5 % más de daño con {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} que no sean de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.
También afecta a las habilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, Conocimiento (disformidad), Conocimiento (xenos), Lógica, Medicae y Uso de tecnología.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each point of an Intelligence bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} (INT) mide la sagacidad, el razonamiento y el conocimiento del personaje. Por cada punto de bonificación por Inteligencia, un personaje inflige un +5 % más de daño con {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} que no sean de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.
También afecta a las habilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, Conocimiento (disformidad), Conocimiento (xenos), Lógica, Medicae y Uso de tecnología.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}はキャラクターの洞察力、理性、知識を示す。INTボーナス1ポイントにつき、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃以外の攻撃で+5%の追加ダメージを付与できる。
さらに{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}、伝承（歪み）、伝承（異種族）、論理、メディケア、技術使用スキルにも影響する。

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} (ИНТ) — это характеристика эрудиции, сообразительности и рационального мышления. За каждую единицу бонуса Интеллекта персонаж наносит +5% урона дальнобойными {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} (не применяется к выстрелам {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}).
Влияет на следующие навыки: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, Знания: Варп, Знания: Ксеносы, Логика, Медицина и Техника.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) is a measurement of the character's acumen, reason, and knowledge. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Intelligence, characters deal 5% more damage with non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} with ranged weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} (ИНТ) — это характеристика эрудиции, сообразительности и рационального мышления.
Влияет на следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знания: Варп{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техника{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} (ИНТ) — это характеристика эрудиции, сообразительности и рационального мышления.
Влияет на следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знания: Варп{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техника{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (INT) bestimmt Scharfsinn, Vernunft und Wissen eines Charakters. Für jeden zusätzlichen Punkt Intelligenz verursacht ein Charakter 5 % mehr Schaden mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}, die keine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g} sind.
Ferner beeinflusst sie die Fertigkeiten {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, Wissen (Warp), Wissen (Xenos), Logik, Medicae und Tech-Einsatz.

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (INT) bestimmt Scharfsinn, Vernunft und Wissen eines Charakters. Für jeden zusätzlichen Punkt Intelligenz verursacht ein Charakter 5 % mehr Schaden mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}, die keine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g} sind.
Ferner beeinflusst sie die Fertigkeiten {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, Wissen (Warp), Wissen (Xenos), Logik, Medicae und Tech-Einsatz.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (INT) bestimmt Scharfsinn, Vernunft und Wissen eines Charakters. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}punkt Intelligenz verursacht ein Charakter 5 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}, die keine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g} sind.
Ferner beeinflusst sie die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (INT) bestimmt Scharfsinn, Vernunft und Wissen eines Charakters. Für jeden Bonuspunkt Intelligenz verursacht ein Charakter 5 % mehr Schaden mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g}, die keine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g} sind.
Ferner beeinflusst sie die Fertigkeiten {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, Wissen (Warp), Wissen (Xenos), Logik, Medicae und Tech-Einsatz.

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT) mesure la perspicacité, la raison et les connaissances du personnage. Pour chaque point d'Intelligence bonus, les personnages infligent 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires lorsqu'ils effectuent des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} (hors attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}).
Elle influe également sur les compétences {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, Connaissance (Warp), Connaissance (Xénos), Logique, Medicae et Technomaîtrise.

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, Lore (Warp), Lore (Xenos), Logic, Medicae, and Tech-Use skills.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} (ZEK) bir karakterin zihinsel yetilerinin, mantığının ve bilgi birikiminin ölçütüdür. Karakter sahip olduğu her ilave Zekâ puanı sayesinde, {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} olmayan {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarında{/g} %5 daha fazla hasar verir.
Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g}, Kültür (Öteboyut), Kültür (Zeno), Mantık, Sıhhiye ve Tekno Aşinalığı yeteneklerine de etki eder.
